name: Chasing Tales: Elegos the Harmless
requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood staff and perform tasks to re-create Elegos's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Elegos the Harmless.

Acquire the heroic spirit of Elegos: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Elegos at a heroic font.
